Sentencas: Nickel is doped successfully at the B-site of La0.3Y0.1Sr0.4TiO3- (LYSTA-) perovskite to yield La0.3Y0.1Sr0.4Ni0.04Ti0.96O3- (LYSNTA-) for its use as an anode for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Ex-soluted nickel particles from LYSNTA- formed upon reduction in hydrogen show average particle size of 6 nm.
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical studies are performed on bilayers of LYSTA-/YSZ and LYSNTA-/YSZ using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) and their SOFC performance is compared with 4 wt% NiO-LYSTA-/YSZ bilayer prepared by impregnation route.
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The activation energy (E-A) for overall electrode polarization (R-p) shows the following trend: LYSTA- (approximate to 1.4 eV) > LYSNTA-
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: (1.1 eV) 4 wt% NiO-LYSTA- (approximate to 1.0 eV) in temperature range of 650-800 degrees C for H-2 oxidation.
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: SOFC performance of full cell containing LYSNTA-
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: anode is better compared to 4 wt% NiO-LYSTA- anode during reversible testing from methane to hydrogen environment.
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Impregnation of 6 wt% CeO2 over LYSNTA- anode in the full cell of SOFC gives a better performance than that without CeO2.
Titulo: Performance comparison of Ni Ex-soluted and impregnated La- and Y- doped Sr titanates as anode for solid oxide fuel cell
